title: Sippy Softswitch v.5.2 Menu Changes
description:
Starting from v.5.2 SippySoft reorganized the Web Navigation Menu.  To simplify the process of navigation, Sippy implemented a "Search" field that will make your work more efficient and clear.  You can find more details about navigation changes in the following video tutorial:



More video tutorials you may find on our official YouTube channel by the following link:

https://www.youtube.com/user/sippysoft
